briefdescription.para: Integrate a full orbit step for a struct of particles with VPA.

detaileddescription.para: The integration is performed for a struct of NSIMD particles using the volume preserving algorithm (Boris method for relativistic particles) see Zhang 2015.
This algorithm is valid for neutral particles as well, in which case the motion reduces to ballistic motion where momentum remains constant.

parameterdescription.para: particle_simd_fo struct that will be updated
pointer to array containing time steps

briefdescription.para: Integrate a full orbit step with VPA and MHd modes present.

detaileddescription.para: Same as previous method but with MHD present.

parameterdescription.para: particle_simd_fo struct that will be updated
pointer to array containing time steps

briefdescription.para: Calculate a full orbit step for a struct of particles with VPA.
